acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Gift of W. T. Thom family in 1948.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection includes 34 letters, 1865-1870, written to his father while Thom was a student at Washington College, four letters to Thom from various correspondents, college grade reports and programs, and other printed material.
